content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* this pattern is a part of *crochet for every room* from the bernat home contest materials bernat cool crochet 50 g/1 75 oz *discontinued* 74008 summer cream 26 balls size 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook gauge 16 double_crochet and 10 row = 4 ins \ 10 cm one motif = 6 ins \ 15 cm square blanket is composed of 99 motifs which are joined in strips crochet edging to finish
